mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM latte_timeline ORDER BY yymmdd DESC, hhmm DESC) WHERE rownum = 1
SELECT * FROM latte_timeline WHERE yymmdd = #{yymmdd} and hhmm = #{hhmm}

SELECT yymmdd, hhmm FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, yymmdd, hhmm FROM ( SELECT yymmdd, hhmm FROM latte_timeline WHERE (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(yymmdd), LPAD(hhmm, 4, '0'))) < #{yymmddhhmm} ORDER BY yymmdd DESC, hhmm DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{ea} ) WHERE rnum <= #{ea} ORDER BY yymmdd, hhmm

SELECT yymmdd, hhmm FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, yymmdd, hhmm FROM ( SELECT yymmdd, hhmm FROM latte_timeline WHERE (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(yymmdd), LPAD(hhmm, 4, '0'))) > #{yymmddhhmm} ORDER BY yymmdd, hhmm ) WHERE rownum <= #{ea} ) WHERE rnum <= #{ea} ORDER BY yymmdd, hhmm
